name: Xump 2: Back to Space
overview: Help Misuki clean up deserted space fields. Her compatriot Holger lent out his headbot Xump to aid the mission. Clear all dissolving tiles on single-screen levels by stepping on them on at a time. Some fields contain mines and need extra care in cleaning. Mines can be detonated when passing by or disarmed when Xump occupies that location for a short duration. The mission briefing sounds easier said than done! Features: * 48 brand new Levels. * 6 atmospheric YM-Tracks. * Beautiful Pixel artwork. * Built in SRAM-Saving system for Highscores and completed levels. * Extras to unlock: The levels of the classic GP32 game Xump Origins (32) and Xump 1 (48) can be unlocked - which gives a total of 128 Levels in the cartridge!
